name: Archery Star
description:
This is a real simulation of archery games, both single game mode and "1 V 1" mode, which means you can compete with other person online, and become a super star in the archery arena.

The operation of the game is easy and cool. It highly simulates the real archery operation.

Archery Star is more than just 1-on-1 matches. Play in single game modes, improve your archery skills in a variety of challenging and fun levels, put yourself to the test and see how far you can go!
